abstract: Coalition of more than 80 colleges and universities announces plan to design simplified college application and online program for college planning and make it available throughout high school; coalition members hope changes will help disadvantaged students during college application process.
lead_paragraph: A coalition of selective colleges and universities said Monday that it would design a simplified application and an online program for college planning throughout high school.

headline.main: Colleges Vow to Simplify Application Process
headline.print_headline: Colleges Vow to Simplify Application Process

snippet: A coalition of selective colleges and universities said Monday that it would design a simplified application and an online program for college planning throughout high school.
